TEXT.TITLE: ALASKA AIR <ALK> TO BUY BACK STOCK
TEXT.BODY: Alaska Air Group Inc said its board authorized management to repurchase up to 320,000 common shares in the open market from time to time. The company said its current stock price does not reflect its full value. Reuter
